title: Accessories
info: Adds accessory slots in addition to the armor slots

title: Advancement Plaques
info: Replace those boring advancement popups with something flashier

title: The Aether
info: A hostile paradise in the sky filled with new mobs, blocks, dungeons, and items

title: The Aether: Enhanced Extinguishing
info: Instead of disallowing fire in the Aether, just extinguish it

title: The Aether: Protect Your Moa
info: Equip tamed Moas with armor and storage

title: The Aether: Treasure Reforging
info: Recycle dungeon loot into new equipment through smithing templates and smelted materials

title: The Aether: Ruined Portals
info: Adds ruined Aether portals, similar to ruined Nether portals

title: The Aether: Temporary Freezing
info: Makes the Aether's ice accessories freeze blocks temporarily, not permanently

title: Allay Upgrades
info: Upgrades Allays with new abilties and QOL features

title: Amendments
info: Improved visuals and functionality for many vanilla blocks

title: AppleSkin
info: Food/hunger-related HUD improvements

title: Attack Through Grass
info: Attack through non-collidable blocks like grass and cobwebs

title: Automobility
info: Adds buildable and drivable vehicles like cars, tractors, and more

title: Bear Minimum
info: Rebalances polar bears & adds black bears, brown bears, and bear meat

title: Better Mount HUD
info: Improves the HUD while riding a mount

title: Better Snowy Biome
info: Improves snowy biomes

title: Better Statistics Screen
info: Improves the statistics screen

title: Better Than Mending
info: Repair mending-enchanted items with your XP bar

title: Better Wolf Companion Mod
info: Introduces a wolf inventory, respawn, self-healing, better combat mechanics & more

title: BetterF3
info: Make the F3 menu more readable

title: Bigger Better End Cities
info: Makes End cities bigger and better

title: Blasting Plus
info: Makes more items smeltable in a blast furnace

title: Borderless Fullscreen
info: Makes the fullscreen mode borderless

title: Bosses of Mass Destruction
info: Adds 4 new bosses to the game

title: Brainier Bees
info: Fixes and improves Bee behavior and pathing

title: Breed More Mods
info: Adds breeding for parrots, zombie horses, skeleton horses, and polar bears

title: Builders Jetpack
info: Consume fuel to use a jetpack for hummingbird-style flight. Good for building

title: Bundle Recipe
info: Backports the bundle recipe from 1.21.2

title: Call Your Horse
info: Use a goat horn to summon tamed horses

title: Cat Jam
info: Cats will now jam when near active jukeboxes

title: Chalk
info: Adds the ability to draw on blocks with chalk

title: Chalk: Colorful Addon
info: Adds additional colors to the Chalk mod

title: Charta
info: Adds Crazy Eights, Uno, and Solitaire decks and card tables supporting up to 8 players

title: Chat Animation
info: Adds smooth animations to chat messages

title: Chat Heads
info: Adds player faces to chat messages

title: Chococraft
info: Adds rideable and breedable Chocobos

title: Chunks Fade In
info: Adds a smooth fade-in animation for chunk loading

title: Clumps
info: Clumps XP orbs together to reduce lag and improve performance

title: Comforts
info: Adds sleeping bads and hammocks for skipping the night without setting a new spawn point

title: Compact Chat
info: Compacts duplicate chat messages into one

title: Concurrent Chunk Management Engine
info: Dramatically improves chunk loading performance

title: Controlling
info: Adds a searchbar to the keybinds menu

title: Cool Rain
info: Creates ambient sounds for certain blocks during rain

title: Craftable Capes
info: Adds craftable capes, including previous rare event capes

title: Critter Armory
info: Adds armor and feed for pigs, cows, sheep, chicken, wolves, and cats

title: Dark Paintings
info: Adds more paintings (Modified by the Party Alternative resource pack)

title: Deeper and Darker
info: Kill the warden and visit the Otherside, a dimension filled with new blocks, mobs, biomes, & items

title: Door Knocking
info: Allows you to knock on doors by left-clicking

title: Easy Anvils
info: Removes prior work penalty & level limits, anvils can now be repaired, & more

title: Easy Magic
info: Cheaper enchantment rerolls, new hopper & comparator functionality, & more

title: Elytra Trinket
info: Allows Elytras to be equipped in the cape slot, freeing up the chestplate slot (Doesn't work with Soul Elytra)

title: Entity Culling
info: Improve performance by not rendering entities that are not visible to the player

title: Even More Instruments
info: Add-on to the Genshin instruments mod that adds instruments for normal people

title: Explorer's Compass
info: Allows players to locate structures anywhere in the world

title: Explorify
info: Adds new additional structures to the Overwld, Nether, & End

title: Explosive Enhancements
info: Makes explosions look better, and adds variable sizing & underwater explosions

title: Exposure
info: Adds a handheld camera system, including film, development, flashbulbs, & wall-mounted photos

title: Exposure: Polaroid
info: Adds an instant camera for the Exposure mod

title: Falling Leaves
info: Adds falling leaf particle effects to leaf blocks

title: FallingTree
info: Take down entire trees and their leaves by breaking the bottom log

title: Farmer's Delight
info: New crops, foods, and an expanded farming and cooking system

title: Farmer's Cutting: The Aether
info: Adds more Famer's Deligh cutting board recipes for The Aether

title: Fast Minecart
info: Makes the minecarts twice as fast

title: Fast Paintings
info: Optimizes the rendering of paintings to improve performance

title: FerriteCore
info: Optimizes memory usage to improve performance

title: Fish of Thieves
info: Adds additional fish from Sea of Thieves.

title: Food Effect Tooltips
info: Adds tooltips detailing the effects of certain food items

title: Full Turtle Armor
info: Adds a chestplate, leggings, and boots to complete the turtle armor set. Good underwater

title: Genshin Instruments
info: Adds Genshin Impact's musical instruments to Minecraft

title: Geophilic
info: A subtle overhaul of vanilla overworld biomes

title: Gipples Galore
info: Adds friendly cave mobs that produce edible gelatin. Breeding may produce hostile variants

title: Glowing Torchflower
info: Makes torchflowers glow

title: GPUTape
info: Fixes VRAM leaks to improve performance

title: Hearths
info: Improves several Nether biomes and adds new structures

title: Heartstone
info: Allows players to locate each other

title: Held Item Tooltips
info: Shows tooltips above the hotbar when switching items

title: Horse Buff
info: Quality of life tweaks for riding horses

title: Immersive Aircraft
info: Build and fly planes, airships, and copeters

title: Iris Shaders
info: Enables the use of shader packs

title: Jade
info: Displays information about blocks and entities when looking at them

title: Jade Addons
info: Adds Jade support for Supplementaries

title: Jade: Your Reputation
info: Adds Villager reputation information on Villagers' tooltips

title: Just Enough Items
info: View all items and recipes in crafting menus

title: Just Hammers
info: Adds hammers that can mine out large areas quickly

title: Kaffee's Dual Ride
info: Allows two players to ride the same horse, donkey, or mule

title: LambDynamicLights
info: Makes dropped or held items & various entities emit light

title: Lead Recipe Backport
info: Backports the lead recipe from 1.21.6

title: Leaf Me Alone
info: Allows you to pass through leaves while riding a mount

title: Lighty
info: Allows you to visualize light levels and see where mobs can spawn

title: Lithium
info: Game logic optimization mod that improves performance

title: Lovely Snails
info: Adds tamable pet snails to the game

title: Luna Slimes
info: Improves animations and overhauls behavior for slimes and magma cubes

title: Macaw's Bridges
info: Adds a variety of craftable bridge blocks

title: Macaw's Doors
info: Adds additional craftable doors, including garage and gate doors

title: Macaw's Trapdoors
info: Adds additional craftable trapdoors

title: Macaw's Windows
info: Adds new varities of craftable windows, blinds, shutters, curtains, and more

title: Magic Mirror
info: Adds an item that teleports you to your spawn point if you're in the Overworld

title: Make Bubbles Pop
info: Adds popping and realistic physics to bubbles and adds them to underwater containers & explosions

title: MasterCutter
info: Greatly expands the functionality of the stonecutter with way more recipes, recycling, & woodcutting

title: Miku Plushies
info: Craftable Hatsune Miku plushies. Can be placed in the world or worn on your head

title: MmmMmmMmmMmm
info: Target Dummy that shows damage dealt and can be equipped with armor

title: Moar Concrete
info: Adds colored concrete slabs, stairs, walls, fences, gates, bricks, panels, and buttons

title: Moog's Missing Villages
info: Adds jungle and swamp villages to the game

title: Mod Menu
info: Adds a mod menu to view the list of mods you have installed.

title: ModernFix
info: Improves performance, reduces memory usage, and fixes many bugs

title: More Delight
info: Extra meals, sandwich-making, and morme features for Farmer's Delight

title: More Villagers: Re-employed
info: Adds more villager professions and workstations

title: Slime Golem
info: Adds a Slime Golem that helps you find slime chunks, and new slime-related items and blocks

title: Music Maker
info: Adds music sheets for composing, instruments for freestyling, and a music box to combine them

title: Nameless Trinkets
info: Adds various trinkets with unique effects and abilities to loot chests

title: Nature's Compass
info: Allows players to locate biomes anywhere in the world

title: Nether Depths Upgrade
info: Adds new plants and fish to the Nether sea, and a new potion & enchant for exploring lava lakes

title: NetherPortalFix
info: Fixes routing issues with close-together Nether portals

title: No Animal Tempt Delay
info: Removes the cooldown period on luring animals with food

title: No Chat Reports
info: Strips cryptographics signatures from chat messages & prevents chat reports

title: No Enchant Block
info: Expands the list of blocks you can place around enchanting tables without blocking them

title: No More Phantoms
info: Removes phantoms and provides an alternate recipe for phantom membranes

title: No Telemetry
info: Removes Mojang's data collection/telemetry

title: Noisium
info: Optimizes world generation performance

title: Paginated Advancements & Custom Frames
info: Overhauls the advancements screen with pagination and custom frames

title: Particle Rain
info: Replaces weather with prettier particle effects

title: Particular
info: Adds new particle effects like fireflies and waterfall cascades

title: Peek
info: Adds additional information about items and blocks

title: Persistent Parrots
info: Parrots will stay perched on your shoulder more consistently

title: Pet Protect
info: Prevent your tamed mobs from tacking damage from you

title: Pick Up Notifier
info: Little pop-ups in the bottom right corner when you pick things up

title: Plushie Mod
info: Adds plushies of various mobs

title: Pocketwatch
info: Display informational items like compasses and clocks to the right of your hotbar

title: Polymorph
info: If a crafting recipe creates multiple potential items, you can choose which one to craft

title: Potion Cauldron
info: Store potions in cauldrons and use them to make tipped arrows

title: Potion Stacking
info: Allows potions to be stored and used in stacks of 16. Cooldown of 1 second between uses

title: Raccoons & Rabies
info: Adds tameable raccoons that spawn in the forest biome. They deal rabies damage, avoidable via bandit armor

title: Raised
info: Fixes a graphical bug with the hotbar

title: Reforged
info: Adds rerollable modifiers to armor and tools

title: Reimagined Trims
info: Overhauls and balances armor trim recipes

title: Reinforced Barrels
info: Adds tiered barrel ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: Reinforced Chests
info: Adds tiered chest ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: Reinforced Shulker Boxes
info: Adds tiered shulker box ugprades with increased storage capacity

title: RightClickHarvest
info: Right click to harvest crops and automatically replant. Fortune hoes increase yield

title: Rustic Delight
info: An add-on for Farmer's Delight that adds Pancakes, Cotton, Coffee, Bell Peppers, fried foods and more

title: Screenshot to Clipboard
info: Screenshots are also copied to the clipboard

title: Screenshot Viewer
info: Adds a screenshto viewer GUI to the game

title: Scribble
info: Improves text formatting in written books

title: Shulker Drops Two
info: Shulkers now drop 2 shells

title: Simple Discord RPC
info: Adds Discord Rich Presence support

title: Simple Hats
info: Adds hats, some of which are dyeable or have particle effects

title: Simple Voice Chat
info: Adds proximity-based voice chat

title: Simply Swords
info: Adds 14 unique weapon variants to the vanilla swords, and powerful loot-chest-excclusive weapons

title: Simple Voice Chat Interaction
info: Voice chat can activate Sculk Sensors and the Warden unless sneaking/whispering

title: Snow Pig
info: Adds snow pigs that spawn in snowy biomes

title: Snuffles
info: Adds friendly snuffles that spawn in snowy biomes

title: Sodium
info: Rendering optimization mod that drastically improves FPS

title: Soul Candles
info: Adds soul fire candles and jack-o-lanterns

title: Soul Fire'd
info: Makes the soul fire overlay blue, and adds Soul Fire Aspect and Soul Flame enchantments

title: Sound Physics Remastered
info: Adds realistic sound physics to in-game sounds and proximity voice chat

title: Spyglass Astronomy
info: Observe planets and stars, name planets, and draw constellations

title: Spyglass Improvements
info: Adds various functionality and improvements to the spyglass

title: Stack Refill
info: Automatically refill the item in your hand when it runs out if a replacement is available in your inventory

title: Stacked Blocks
info: Allows many blocks to be crafted 8:1 into stacked blocks using leads

title: Status Effect Bars
info: Adds customizable bars to the status effects overlay to show the remaining duration of effects.

title: Structory
info: Adds more structures to the Overworld

title: Structory: Towers
info: Adds biome-themed tower structures to the Overworld, Nether, and End

title: Supplementaries
info: Adds additional functional and aesthetic blocks and items

title: Supplementaries Squared
info: Adds extra content to Supplementaries

title: Text Formatting Everywhere
info: Removes restriction in typing section sign (§), so you can use text formatting everywhere.

title: Tide
info: Adds 60+ new fish, fishable crates, a fishing rod upgrade system, a fishing journal, and a modular hook/bait/line system

title: Tiny Item Animations
info: Adds little animations when you pick up and move items

title: Toggle Item Frames
info: Make item frames invisible by right-clicking with an empty hand while sneaking

title: Trinkets
info: Adds a group/slot system for equipping items. Integrates with accessories

title: Trowel
info: Adds a tool that, when right-clicked, will pick a random black from your hotbar and place it down

title: Unnamed Sea
info: Adds beach and ocean-focused structures

title: Vanilla Backport
info: Backports modern Minecraft content updates to the current version

title: Vanilla Tweaks - Crafting Tweaks
info: Dropper to Dispenser, Rotten Flesh to Leather, Copper Powered Rails, Sandstone Dyeing, Powder to Glass, Universal Dyeing, Craftable Gravel, Craftable Horse Armor, Craftable Coral Blocks 3x3, Craftable Enchanted Golden Apples, Craftable Nametags, Unpackable Ice, Unpackable Nether Ward, Unpackable Wool

title: Vanilla Tweaks - Data Packs
info: Custom Nether Portals, Mini Blocks, More Mob Heads, Player Head Drops, Silence Mobs, Wandering Trades, Cauldron Concrete, Cauldron Mud, Ender Chest Always Drops, Unlock All Recipes, Graves, AFK Display, Villager Death Messages, Wandering Trader Announcements

title: Verdance
info: Adds new biomes, blocks, and mobs with a focus on plant life

title: Villages & Pillages
info: Adds villages populated only by witches

title: Visuality
info: Adds fancy new particle effects

title: Wakes
info: Adds wake effects to entities that move through water, like boats and players

title: Warden Bossbars
info: Adds bossbars to all Wardens within 100 block of the player

title: Waystones
info: Adds Waystones that players can warp to once they've been activated via Warp Scrolls, Warp Stones, or other Waystones

title: YUNG's Better Desert Temples
info: Overhauls the vanilla desert temples

title: YUNG's Better Jungle Temples
info: Overhauls the vanilla jungle temples

title: YUNG's Better Mineshafts
info: Overhauls the vanilla abandoned mineshafts

title: YUNG's Bridges
info: Hold Q to wind up your arm and release to throw items
